mapper.select: SELECT sido_code AS sidoCode, sido_name AS sidoName FROM sido
SELECT sido_code AS sidoCode, sido_name AS sidoName FROM sido WHERE sido_code = #{sidoCode}
SELECT content_code AS contentCode, content_name AS contentName FROM trip_type
SELECT gugun_code AS gugunCode, gugun_name AS gugunName FROM gugun WHERE sido_code = #{sidoCode}
SELECT gugun_code AS gugunCode, gugun_name AS gugunName FROM gugun WHERE sido_code = #{sidoCode} AND gugun_code = #{gugunCode}
SELECT content_id AS contentId, title, addr1 AS addr, addr2, latitude, longitude, first_image AS firstImage FROM attraction_info WHERE sido_code = #{sidoCode} AND first_image != "" LIMIT 1

SELECT content_id AS contentId, title, addr1 AS addr, addr2, latitude, longitude, first_image AS firstImage, ( 6371 * acos ( cos ( radians(#{latitude}) ) * cos( radians( latitude ) ) * cos( radians( longitude ) - radians(#{longitude}) ) + sin ( radians(#{latitude}) ) * sin( radians( latitude ) ) ) ) AS distance FROM attraction_info ORDER BY distance LIMIT 4

SELECT info.content_id AS contentId, info.title, info.zipcode, info.addr1 AS addr, info.addr2, info.latitude, info.longitude, info.first_image AS firstImage, (SELECT content_name FROM trip_type type WHERE type.content_code = info.content_type_id) AS content_type, description.overview FROM attraction_info info JOIN attraction_description description ON info.content_id = description.content_id WHERE info.content_id = #{contentId}
